forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. Southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
Overnight, the city has settled under a gentle cloak of mostly cloudy skies, allowing a comfortable chill to linger in the air, a low around fifty that invites the warmth of your favorite blanket. As you awaken to Saturday, the clouds will gradually give way, revealing a mostly sunny day where the light begins to dance on the familiar hills. With temperatures peaking near sixty-two and gradually tapering off as the afternoon wears on, the gentle sway of southwest winds, whispering at three to ten miles per hour, promises a lovely opportunity to explore the wonders of the city as the warmth settles in.

While the marine layer may stubbornly cling to the edges of the bridge, the magnificent views beyond become clearer as the day unfolds. Dressing in layers will be your best strategy—a light jacket or sweater for the crisp morning air that melds seamlessly with the gentle embrace of a t-shirt beneath, making the most of today's mild temperament. Stroll through the tranquil streets or find a cozy café where you can linger over a warm cup, watching the world regain its vibrancy. As the sun becomes your companion, consider a leisurely walk through Golden Gate Park, immersing yourself in the greenery, or perhaps enjoying a quiet moment by the water, where the reflections shimmer beneath the evolving sky.
